Quick Start

Get started with Constrictor in minutes:

pip install constrictor
constrictor new my_project
cd my_project
constrictor generate blog
constrictor run

Features

  • Modular Structure: Organize your Flask app into separate modules
  • YAML Templates: Generate modules using declarative templates
  • Blueprint Support: Seamless integration with Flask Blueprints
  • CLI Interface: Simple commands for project management
  • Automated Testing: Built-in test generation and execution
